Sprawdzenie prostych sekwencji (rys. 15.6)
eps(Float32)            => 1.1920929e-7
bitstring(eps(Float32)) => 00110100000000000000000000000000
bitstring(1. + eps(Float32)/2) => 0011111111110000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000000
bitstring(1. + eps(Float32))   => 0011111111110000000000000000000000100000000000000000000000000000
bitstring(1. + 2*eps(Float32)) => 0011111111110000000000000000000001000000000000000000000000000000
bitstring(Float32(Inf))  => 01111111100000000000000000000000
bitstring(Float32(-Inf)) => 11111111100000000000000000000000
bitstring(Float32(NaN))  => 01111111110000000000000000000000
bitstring(Float32(-0.009765625)) => 10111100001000000000000000000000
bitstring(Float32(2.)^(-126-3))  => 00000000000100000000000000000000
Float32((10.)^3) + Float32((10.)^(3-8)) => 1000.0
Float32((10.)^3)                        => 1000.0
Float32((10.)^(3-8))                    => 1.0e-5
